SELECT T1.REQ_SEQ /*요청일련번호*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REQ_DTTI, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS REQ_DTTI /*요청일시*/ , T1.USER_ID /*사용자아이디*/ , T1.USER_IP /*사용자아이피*/ , T1.REQ_URI /*요청경로*/ , IF(LENGTH(T1.REQ_PARAM) > 100, CONCAT(SUBSTR(T1.REQ_PARAM, 1, 100),'...'), T1.REQ_PARAM) REQ_PARAM /*요청파라미터*/ , T1.REQ_TYPE_CODE /*요청타입코드*/ , IFNULL(T2.CODE_DETAIL_NM, '기타') REQ_TYPE_NM /*요청타입명*/ FROM TB_LOG_REQ T1 /*테이블_요청로그*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE_DETAIL T2 /*테이블_코드상세*/ ON T1.REQ_TYPE_CODE = T2.CODE_DETAIL
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%')
ORDER BY REQ_DTTI DESC
LIMIT ${strIdx}, ${pageLength}
